results.name: a(n)^2 is the smallest square containing exactly n 0's.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,10).
program: (MAGMA) a:=[0,10,320]; [n le 3 select a[n] else 10*Self(n-2):n in [1..25]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Oct 11 2019
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999
